Great Monitoring Doesn't Need to be Complicated

Designed for busy teams who want to get back to doing what they love

Notfications When Your Health Checks Fail

Opsee sends you notifications when you need them, and stays out of your way when you don't. Send to email, Slack, or wherever your team communicates.

Opsee Manages Your Health Checks for You

When you create a health check for a service, Opsee automatically applies it to the right instances and keeps track of new instances for you using AWS APIs.

Real Incident Response Tools

When there's a problem, you can take action from any device.

  • Restart instances
  • Restart processes
  • Silence alerts for any instance, service, or check

No SSH or cURL Required

Once you add our Bastion Instance to your environment, it runs your health checks and watches for new instances and services automatically.
